document_data.name: ''Qaynat''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Qaynat''''' was a group of beautiful and talented women gathered by the fourth [[Grand Caliph]] of [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{Cite dragon/190/Sounds of Wonder & Delight}}
document_data.History: Obsessed with beauty, the fourth Grand Caliph filled his [[Royal Harim of Huzuz|harim]] with physically dazzling women who were also skilled musicians and behaved in a proper courtly manner. Though the women of the ''Qaynat'' were technically slaves, they wanted for nothing. It was widely believed that their collective beauty had not been matched in any other harim in Zakhara.
